structure.description: Root app shell for SaaS dashboard. Manages responsive layout, theme (light/dark), and global state. Requires: user profile data, notifications list, branding (logo, product name), navigation items, permissions/feature flags.
structure.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI StackLayout examples with different orientations, spacing, and responsive behavior. Include examples for common layout patterns and styling with Tailwind CSS classes. Provide complete implementation with all props.

children.description: Top app bar with branding, global search, and user actions. Sticky with shadow. Needs: branding assets, search data source, notifications list, user profile.

children.description: Global search with typeahead suggestions over entities (users, transactions, docs). Requires: search endpoint, debounce, keyboard nav.
children.mcpQuery: Show me Kendo UI AutoComplete/ComboBox examples for a global app bar search with async remote data, loading indicator, keyboard navigation, and custom item templates. Include examples for debounced queries, accessibility (aria), and overlaying suggestion popup over content with width matching input.

Show me Kendo UI ComboBox configured for async filtering with server search, custom item template (icon + entity type), clear button, and dark mode compatible styles. Include API for onChange, onOpen, onFilter, and how to control popup width.

metadata.description: Comprehensive SaaS dashboard ACT with header, collapsible sidebar, KPI cards, interactive charts, data table, FAB, footer, and supportive modals/toasts. Includes rich component diversity, Tailwind styles, and targeted Kendo MCP queries for mappable components.
